name: Nicky - The Home Alone Golf Ball
description: A poor and home alone golf ball needs your help to get your goal - to find his home ( a hole in a golf track ) in less movements as possible. Nicky moves only with mouse, you just need to drag, look at some point and release. The game is funny and challenging!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
